extension.name: NHS email -> SMS gateway
extension.description: Work-in-progress extension to implement outbound SMS via the UK's secure NHS.net email -> SMS gateway.

maintainer.author: Nick Holden at the Leicester Cardiovascular BRU

extension.comments: This is a new, partially developed module. It should work, provided you set one line in the API parameters within CiviCRM, which should be the flag "--cacert " followed by the absolute location of the NHS net server certificate. For support, contact nrh11@le.ac.uk
